statements: SELECT * FROM user_transactions ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM user_transactions WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type FROM user_transactions WHERE user_id = 50 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_amount FROM user_transactions;
SELECT * FROM user_transactions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date, transaction_type FROM user_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_amount FROM user_transactions WHERE user_id = 2 AND transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM user_transactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount FROM user_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit' GROUP BY user_id HAVING AVG(transaction_amount) > 500 ORDER BY average_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, amount, status, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE last_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 1001 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM users WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING transaction_count > 5;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_transactions;
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount FROM user_transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user_transactions ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM user_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING avg_amount > 100;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM user_transactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY transaction_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, AVG(transaction_amount) FROM user_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING AVG(transaction_amount) > 1000;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM user_audit_log WHERE action = 'login' GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT user_id, analysis_result FROM user_analysis_data WHERE analysis_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(transaction_amount) FROM user_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING MAX(transaction_amount) < 5000;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, account_balance FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT email, username FROM user_accounts WHERE username LIKE '%a%';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount < 0 ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE activity_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, account_balance FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance < 0;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT full_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT group_name FROM user_groups ORDER BY group_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, total_amount FROM user_transactions_summary WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions_audit ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT full_name, email FROM users WHERE created_at < '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM user_transactions_summary GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_spent > 1000;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, u.full_name, t.transaction_date FROM transactions t JOIN users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id WHERE t.amount > 500 ORDER BY t.amount DESC;

SELECT u.full_name, t.transaction_id, t.amount, ua.audit_date FROM transactions t JOIN users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id JOIN transactions_audit ua ON t.transaction_id = ua.transaction_id WHERE u.email = 'example@email.com' ORDER BY ua.audit_date DESC;
